thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Michael Ohalloran
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Michael Ohalloran

author: Michael Ohalloran
title: Michael Ohalloran
text:
We always deal with Omega and they are great to deal with.
However the last car was a bit ordinary:
(1) There was an ant infestation which cleared up in a few days.
(2) The left rear back door was not locking properly.
(3) The boot lock jammed on a few occasions.
(4) The "space saver" spare tyre was down to 15 psi.
But overall we were happy and will go with Omega again.
Love NZ and the people.
